评论详情: My husband likes them because of the 90s style I love them because I get to put a whole bunch of stuff in his pockets
It looks good just on picture !!!! This pants are horrible in real life. It looks like some old dirty work pants. Never buying this again.

My daughter has been wearing these for a while now. They appear much baggier in the pics, but I'm sure that depends on height and stuff too. She's 5'7 and they are still baggy enough. They've washed up well and haven't faded. We wash all of our dark stuff together. They're comfortable and look great on her. Nice quality for sure!
I got this for my son to start school year with new clothes and shoes. His word was this looks fit! Not sure of the meaning, but he was happy!

These pants arrived quickly. They are overly LONG and baggy, but that's the point. There are a lot of usable pockets too. They washed up nicely. Good durable jean-like fabric too. Great price for a pair of durable baggy pants.
